Still cant find the crack.exe where did you hide it?

ok here are instructions to where the crack.exe is.

1. make sure u have the phychonauts iso mounted to daemon tools or whatever program u got to mount it.

2. click start and click on my computer.

3. right click on whatver virtual drive u have phychonauts on. (for example i have a virtual drive L and the main characters face is on it)

4. after the right click u click open not autoplay.

5. then click on the HOODLUM folder and there it is. just replace the original phychonauts exe, with that one in the HOODLUM folder.
